Assess and address environmental impacts, ensuring projects comply with environmental regulations and sustainable practices. column2: Designing infrastructure projects: The Civil Engineer must develop plans and designs for infrastructure projects, taking into account factors such as cost, safety, environmental impact, and construction feasibility.     Analyzing data: The Civil Engineer must analyze data, such as survey reports, environmental impact studies, and geotechnical reports, to inform design decisions and ensure that projects meet relevant standards and regulations.     Managing projects: The Civil Engineer must manage infrastructure projects from start to finish, including overseeing construction, coordinating with contractors and other stakeholders, and ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget.     Conducting site inspections: The Civil Engineer must conduct site inspections to ensure that construction work is being performed according to plans and specifications, and to identify and address any issues that arise.     Ensuring safety and compliance: The Civil Engineer must ensure that infrastructure projects are designed and constructed to meet relevant safety standards and regulations, and that appropriate permits and approvals are obtained.     Maintaining infrastructure: The Civil Engineer must oversee maintenance and repairs of existing infrastructure, ensuring that it remains safe and functional for its intended use.     To be successful as a Civil Engineer, candidates should have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as excellent communication and project management skills.      They should also have a solid understanding of engineering principles and practices, and be familiar with relevant regulations and standards.
column11: Real estate construction, Civil

column2: A Civil Supervisor is a professional who oversees and manages construction projects in the civil engineering field. Their duties typically include:Planning, organizing, and directing the work of construction crews on the job siteEnsuring that construction projects are completed within budget, on time, and to the required quality standardsReviewing blueprints and construction plans to identify potential problems and suggest improvementsMonitoring construction progress, inspecting work in progress, and ensuring compliance with safety regulations and building codesMaintaining effective communication with clients, contractors, and other stakeholdersCoordinating the delivery of materials, equipment, and labor to the job siteManaging and training construction crews, including assigning tasks and monitoring performanceResolving disputes, negotiating with contractors and suppliers, and making decisions that impact the success of the projectPreparing reports, tracking budgets and schedules, and maintaining project documentation
column11: Civil Supervisor

Design tunnel linings, portal structures, and underground station elements, ensuring structural integrity and safety.     Recommend appropriate construction materials, considering load-bearing capacity, durability, cost-effectiveness, and environmental impact.     Ensure all structural designs adhere to relevant building codes, safety standards, and regulations.     Implement quality assurance procedures to verify that construction and materials align with approved structural designs.     Identify potential risks and hazards related to structural integrity and develop effective mitigation strategies.     Stay updated with industry advancements and apply innovative design solutions to optimize structural efficiency and sustainability.     Provide technical support during the construction phase, addressing design-related queries and providing clarifications to ensure accurate implementation.     Maintain meticulous records of all structural design plans, calculations, drawings, and project-related documentation.       ?       Job Requirements:         B.Tech in Civil Engineering; M.Tech in Structural Engineering (preferred).     Minimum 12-15 years of experience in structural design engineering, specifically in metro rail projects, tunnels, and underground metro stations, with an added advantage of elevated/viaduct experience. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.     Excellent communication and collaboration abilities to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team.

Developing specifications, procurement support, reviewing vendor drawings         Create accurate estimates for the project to match standard industrial practice.         Monitor and provide regular updates to assistant department manager about progress and activities to ensure projects remain on schedule and within budget. Support project team to develop significant engineering solutions         Participate in regular meeting and corresponding with Clients.         Ability and willingness to travel as needed within the continental US to support assignments on projects and overall office needs.         Willing to advance in career by taking increased engineering design responsibilities by closely working with discipline lead engineer         Ensure that all duties are carried out according to the companys Quality Systems Procedures.         A committed team player able to work on own initiative         Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, client service orientation         Identify development needs of team and mentor, coach and develop team members (engineers, designers, drafters)         Provide specialist knowledge input and keep up to date with the latest developments in particular fields.         Self-starter with excellent communication skills, both verbal and written to communicate effectively with internal team members and external clients. column2: We are currently seeking a skilled and detail-oriented BIM Coordinator with expertise in Civil or MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing) disciplines       As a BIM Coordinator, you will be responsible for managing the coordination process and ensuring the successful implementation of Building Information Modeling (BIM) on our projects     You will collaborate closely with architects, engineers, contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless communication, clash detection, and efficient project deliver            Responsibilities:             Coordinate and manage the BIM process for Civil or MEP projects from conception to completion.         Collaborate with architects, engineers, and other project team members to develop BIM execution plans and project-specific protocols.         Create and maintain 3D BIM models using software such as Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, or similar tools.         Conduct clash detection and resolution to identify and resolve conflicts between various building systems.         Develop and maintain project-specific BIM libraries, templates, and content.         Facilitate model exchange and coordination meetings to ensure effective communication and collaboration among stakeholders.         Train and support project team members in BIM software and workflows.         Review and evaluate BIM models for compliance with project requirements, standards, and industry best practices.         Generate construction documentation, including 2D drawings, schedules, and quantity take-offs from the BIM models.         Stay updated with the latest BIM technologies, industry standards, and emerging trends.         Continuously improve BIM processes, workflows, and protocols to enhance efficiency and productivity.             Qualifications:             Bachelor s degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.         Proven experience as a BIM Coordinator, preferably in the Civil or MEP industry.         Proficiency in BIM software tools such as Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, or similar applications.         Strong understanding of Civil or MEP systems and construction processes.         Familiarity with clash detection and coordination processes.         Knowledge of relevant codes, regulations, and industry standards.         Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.         Strong communication and interpersonal skills.         Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality.             Preferred Skills:             Professional certifications related to BIM, such as Autodesk Certified Professional (ACP) or equivalent.         Experience with clash detection software or tools.         Familiarity with cloud-based collaboration platforms for BIM projects.         Knowledge of energy modeling or sustainability analysis tools.         Experience in coordinating multi-disciplinary BIM models.

column2: Role Description: BIM Engineer Highway       For some exciting engineering projects in the Transportation realm, across various regions of India, we are looking to appoint a    Highways BIM Engineer    to support the delivery of complex civil engineering and multidisciplinary BIM models across a range of major projects.     We aim in offering a truly multi-disciplinary capability and bring exciting opportunities to influence major transportation projects from beginning to end. Our vision is to be the world s best consultancy firm to leverage use of BIM and embracing the digital future to bring about transformational benefits for the Transportation Engineering industry.       This key post will be based out of      Bhubaneswar   , which deliver to all of regions across the India. Our portfolio of work continues to grow and we will offer a challenging and rewarding opportunity to apply knowledge, experience and problem solving skills.     As a       Highways BIM Engineer     ,    you will be a key part of the model delivery team and will be an experienced BIM user and coordinator with some management experience. Reporting to the Lead BIM Engineer, you will be responsible for the project BIM model production resources. This role offers excellent opportunities for career development for the right candidate.       Responsibilities:         Produce intelligent 3D models and extract information directly from the model to form 2D drawings, schedules, setting out, quantities and other deliverables.     Manage the Highways discipline 3D models, review model quality and technical content including clash detection and compliance with the BEP.     Provide commercial input by pricing up BIM tasks for bids and projects as required.     Work with the Information Manager and project teams to assist in the development and implementation of BIM strategies, BIM Execution Plans, workflows and processes on projects in accordance with Atkins Corporate Standards, Client requirements and industry best practice.     Actively contribute to project design development by contributing to internal coordination, clash detection and design review sessions as well as external presentations to clients.     Manage the Structures Team Common Data Environment (CDE) of the project, and the distribution of coordinated digital documents to the project teams.     Undertake 4D BIM Project timeline modelling.     Provide quality control for compliance to company/project standards of deliverables.     Provide over the shoulder support for staff developing models and 2D drawing extractions.     Provide technical orientation of new hires and student trainees regarding BIM process and workflows.     Maintain a high level of competency of major BIM software tools used.
column11: 3D, Career development, Compliance, Design review, Bim, Design development, Engineering projects, Manager Quality Control, Civil engineering, Project design

column2: The BIM Modeler is expected to have in depth knowledge of Bentley s MicroStation 2D and 3D along with some experience in 3D modeling using Open Plant Modeler or Open Building Modeler formerly known as AECOsim      This BIM Modeler is expected to perform variety of design/drafting activities including preparing/updating plan/sections / 3D modeling/ creating drawings sheets using 3D models and Dynamic Views      Also, should have some experience in Water and Wastewater Treatment plants modeling and drafting            Job Requirements:    Should be proficient using MicroStation 2D and AECOsim (Open Building Modeler) to work on the following areas;    - 3D Modelling and 2D sheets creation using 3D model and dynamic views    - Understanding of Cell creation and Worksets creation    - Understanding of Federated 3D models and creation of iModels    - Working knowledge of Process Mechanical, Civil and Electrical discipline    - Production of drawings for construction purpose    - Integrating MicroStation / AECOsim output with Navisworks and some basic understanding of Clash Detection and P&ID generation using Piping Models.    - Proficiency also includes a strong understanding of MicroStation        -Annotation styles and annotation tools, object and label styles, solid understanding of key objects such as Workset, Cell, iModel, Dynamic View, Sheet and Model Views, References, Federated Models and ProjectWise.    Implement innovative approach to reduce drawing production cost and hours.    -Efficient use/plugins for integrating other applications to generate drawings based on specific project requirement.    -Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions.    -Attending client coordination and review meetings, preparing and presenting project status updates and supporting Project Lead/Team Lead in engineering-related tasks.    -Implement Safety and Quality aspects into design.    Travel to abroad/other offices in India for project and assignments etc.          -Minimum Qualifications      BE or Diploma in Mechanical / Civil Engineering (Preferred)    -12+ years of working experience of using MicroStation V8i and Connect Version to create 2D drawings    -5+ years of working experience of using Bentley AECOsim / Open Building Modeler V8i and Connect Version to create 3D models and 2D drawings views    -5+ years of working experience in delivering multidisciplinary projects    Bentley Certification will be a plus    -Experience with 3D modelling and 2D drawings for Water and Wastewater treatment plants    -Experience in collaborative working environment like ProjectWise    -Excellent written and oral communication skills    -Independent player with high self-motivation    Experience on International Projects will be added advantage    -Knowledge / Experience in Bentley Open Plant Modeler (V8i and Connect Version) or Open Plant PID is a plus

column2: You will join our Structural Engineering team in the Arcadis GEC, part of the Mobility GBA, where our projects and development opportunities can fit various ambitions from structural engineering, 3D modelling and parametric design to Operate Maintain digital methods. The delivery is secured through global collaboration platforms like ACC, which allows engineers across various offices to work together seamlessly while maintaining clear visibility for our clients.        Role accountabilities:         Your role will include, but is not limited to:         Profound knowledge and experience of BIM is required, as well as an understanding of engineering and architecture;     Reviewing and ensuring compliance in the components of the project for which you have responsibility, including drawings, and BIM model requirements;     Participate in the production of 2D drawings from BIM models with accuracy ensuring drawings produced are according to the Arcadis and/or the Client s Drafting Standards and Procedures, and the drawing submission schedule is achieved;     Providing technical advice to project team members;     Prepare and update 3D BIM models for development of CSD models for submissions     Participate the CSD coordination meetings with engineers and designers     Building and maintaining effective relationships with partners on projects;      Liaising with the Line Manager to keep informed of all developments associated with the project;     Maintaining a good understanding of the background of the Arcadis business areas to facilitate building effective and enduring relationships and consolidating both company and personal credibility in the industry;     Providing direction to the project team, leading by example to achieve goals and championing a quality, innovative, client-focused culture;     Define all the CSD issues and prepare and distribute the issues accordingly. Follow up with the project team on CSD and BIM model updates;     Knowledge sharing with others, team working spirit.         Qualifications Experience:         Relevant structural engineering degree.     Proven experience as a BIM Modeler, with a minimum of 5 years in a similar role.     Demonstrate an analytical mindset and a proactive attitude toward self-directed learning and professional development.     Relevant experience in CS, Reinforcement/ Architectural BIM Models related to civil projects     Experienced in creating detailed plans and bills of quantities for reinforced concrete, as well as for reinforced and prestressed structures, steel structures, and/or composite structures, demonstrating competence in this area.     Experienced and competent in projects developed in the BIM environment.     Understanding of construction phasing and sequencing for complex projects.     Analytical mindset and self-learning attitude.     Have a track record in designing specialized structural elements such as tunnels, shafts, bridge decks, abutments, piles, or retaining walls.     Proficient in detailing software for reinforced concrete.     Ability to guide and check the work of other team members.     Display exceptional command of technical English terminology and communication skills.             Nice to have:         Familiarity with parametric design and scripting languages, such as Dynamo or Grasshopper     Ability and interest in learning and developing new technologies and automation processes.     Ability to create custom families and templates to enhance BIM workflows.     Experience with laser scanning and point cloud data integration into BIM models     Strong understanding of industry standards and best practices, including ISO 19650 or COBie     Familiarity with GIS (Geographic Information System) and its integration with BIM for geospatial analysis     Multilingual proficiency in languages like French and German             Key attributes:         Professional approach to time, costs and quality.     Great interpersonal skills (teamwork, supportive attitude, eagerness to learn, proactivity, assertive communication).           ?

column2: Prepare estimates by gathering architectural plans, specifications and related documents for new plans and allot specific starts from the current start schedule.          Present prepared estimate(s) utilizing PlanSwift Professional Software, AutoCad, Master Project or other software by assembling plan specific trade type Take Offs and master plan Take Offs.          Prepare special reports utilizing the PlanSwift Professional Software Report Designer and/or Excel templates by Trade Type.          Maintain the database for base, elevation and option Take Offs/estimates in Master Project or on SharePoint.          Update Plan Take Offs when ARM s / PMR s are released and provide quantity adjustments to divisions.          Work with trade partners, vendors, architectural services and production department to reconcile discrepancies in Take Offs.          Create and Update Templates within Planswift for Corporate and Division use. Collaborate with Architecture in controlling costs on prototype design.          Train Division Estimators and Corporate Junior Estimators. Assist Divisions in Estimating on Trade Types as needed.          Document process of estimating trade types and update Estimating Manual as needed.          Assist field operations in material overages / shortages.          Review variance purchase orders assigned to V12 (Newstar system) for approval.          Conduct field audits to validate product quantities to reduce variances.          Prepare Estimating tracking and reporting tools and schedule regular meetings to facilitate managing the estimating workload.          Prepare Take Off estimates for all trade types for the division purchasing teams to utilize in their negotiation with trade partners.          Attend Manufacturer and Subcontractor meetings and prepare/distribute meeting notes internally and externally.          Schedule and attend any additional estimating classes for Planswift and/or additional estimating software (i.e. Pipeline) with Operations Manager - Estimating.          Schedule and attend training sessions for internal Estimating Department.          Complete all other duties as assigned by manager.        Eligibility Criteria:      REQUIRED SKILLS        Strong English communication skills (read, write, listen and speak).          Competency in Microsoft Office suite.          Excellent knowledge of AutoCAD.          In-depth knowledge of PlanSwift, BlueBeam REVU RFMS Measure etc. is essential.          Ability to read blueprints / drawings received from customers.          Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously.          Ability to interpret specification sheets from architects and designers.          Natural details orientation.          Solid understanding of importance of accuracy and precision in work.          Ability to meet deadline consistently.Candidates must have a reliable power backup.        PREFERRED ATTRIBUTES        High School Diploma required / Bachelor s Degree preferred.          Experience in reading blueprint is highly recommend.          Must have minimum 2 5 year s experience in Construction / Stone industry.        ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS        This is a full-time, permanent, and remote position.          Candidates must have a reliable power backup.          Must possess a well-maintained Laptop and additional Desktop screen          Fiber line internet connection with 80-100 MBPS net speed.          Head gears with noise cancellation function and a mike

column2: Sunteck Realty  is looking for Site Execution Senior Engineer  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    As a Site Execution Senior Engineer, you will take a leadership role in overseeing and managing on-site execution of construction projects     This involves coordinating with project teams, ensuring quality standards, and managing the construction process to achieve successful and timely project completion       Key Responsibilities:       Project Leadership:Lead and supervise on-site execution teams, providing guidance and support     Collaborate with project managers and design teams to ensure project goals are met     Planning and Coordination:Develop detailed execution plans, timelines, and resource requirements for construction projects     Coordinate with site managers, contractors, and subcontractors to ensure efficient project implementation     Quality Assurance:Implement and oversee quality control processes to ensure compliance with design and safety standards     Conduct regular inspections to monitor and maintain the quality of construction work     Material Procurement:Coordinate with procurement teams to ensure timely and efficient sourcing of construction materials     Inspect and approve materials for use in projects     Budget Management:Monitor project budgets and expenses related to site execution     Identify cost-saving opportunities without compromising quality     Health and Safety Leadership:Ensure compliance with safety regulations and standards on construction sites     Conduct safety training sessions and promote a culture of safety among project teams     Client Communication:Maintain regular communication with clients to provide updates on project progress     Address client concerns and ensure client satisfaction with the execution process     Team Development:Foster a positive team environment, providing mentorship and coaching to on-site teams     Encourage continuous learning and development     Qualifications:Bachelors degree in Civil Engineering or a related field     Professional certification and licensure as required     Proven experience in site execution and construction management

column2: Designing infrastructure projects: The Civil Engineer must develop plans and designs for infrastructure projects, taking into account factors such as cost, safety, environmental impact, and construction feasibility.     Analyzing data: The Civil Engineer must analyze data, such as survey reports, environmental impact studies, and geotechnical reports, to inform design decisions and ensure that projects meet relevant standards and regulations.     Managing projects: The Civil Engineer must manage infrastructure projects from start to finish, including overseeing construction, coordinating with contractors and other stakeholders, and ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget.     Conducting site inspections: The Civil Engineer must conduct site inspections to ensure that construction work is being performed according to plans and specifications, and to identify and address any issues that arise.     Ensuring safety and compliance: The Civil Engineer must ensure that infrastructure projects are designed and constructed to meet relevant safety standards and regulations, and that appropriate permits and approvals are obtained.     Maintaining infrastructure: The Civil Engineer must oversee maintenance and repairs of existing infrastructure, ensuring that it remains safe and functional for its intended use.     To be successful as a Civil Engineer, candidates should have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as excellent communication and project management skills.      They should also have a solid understanding of engineering principles and practices, and be familiar with relevant regulations and standards.

column2: We are seeking a skilled and dedicated BIM Engineer with expertise in Civil or MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing) disciplines       As a BIM Engineer, you will play a crucial role in our project team, utilizing Building Information Modeling (BIM) software to create and manage 3D models, design coordination, clash detection, and construction documentation     You will collaborate closely with architects, engineers, and construction professionals to ensure successful project outcome            Responsibilities:             Develop and maintain accurate 3D models using BIM software (such as Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, or similar tools) for Civil or MEP projects.         Collaborate with architects, engineers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and design intent.         Conduct clash detection and resolution to identify and resolve conflicts in design or construction documents.         Assist in the development and implementation of BIM standards, protocols, and workflows.         Generate construction documentation, including detailed drawings, schedules, and quantity take-offs.         Perform quality checks on BIM models and ensure compliance with project specifications and standards.         Support the coordination process by participating in meetings, providing technical expertise, and resolving design-related issues.         Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices related to BIM and construction.             Qualifications:             Bachelor s degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.         Proven experience as a BIM Engineer, preferably in the Civil or MEP industry.         Proficiency in BIM software tools such as Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, or similar applications.         Strong understanding of Civil or MEP systems and construction processes.         Knowledge of relevant codes, regulations, and industry standards.         Familiarity with clash detection and coordination processes.         Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.         Strong communication and collaboration abilities.         Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality.             Preferred Skills:             Professional certifications related to BIM, such as Autodesk Certified Professional (ACP) or equivalent.         Experience with other BIM-related software and tools.         Familiarity with cloud-based collaboration platforms for BIM projects.         Knowledge of energy modeling or sustainability analysis tools.
column11: Analytical skills, Civil, Construction, Mechanical electrical plumbing, Bim, MEP, REVIT, Autodesk, Civil engineering, construction documentation

E (Civil) and M.Tech (Transportation Engineering)   Desired Profile    Shall be responsible for overall transport planning, coordination and control in TRB Strategic Business Unit. Continuously review existing business strategies and targets for better alignment with business goals.   Ensure practice of road safety measures in design, construction, operation and maintenance of highway projects to minimize accidents.   Conduct road safety audits, identify back spot and recommend appropriate solutions for reducing accidents.   Preparation of traffic and safety management plans.

column2: Role Description: BIM Engineer Highway       For some exciting engineering projects in the Transportation realm, across various regions of India, we are looking to appoint a    Highways BIM Engineer    to support the delivery of complex civil engineering and multidisciplinary BIM models across a range of major projects.     We aim in offering a truly multi-disciplinary capability and bring exciting opportunities to influence major transportation projects from beginning to end. Our vision is to be the world s best consultancy firm to leverage use of BIM and embracing the digital future to bring about transformational benefits for the Transportation Engineering industry.       This key post will be based out of      Bhubaneswar   , which deliver to all of regions across the India. Our portfolio of work continues to grow and we will offer a challenging and rewarding opportunity to apply knowledge, experience and problem solving skills.     As a       Highways BIM Engineer     ,    you will be a key part of the model delivery team and will be an experienced BIM user and coordinator with some management experience. Reporting to the Lead BIM Engineer, you will be responsible for the project BIM model production resources. This role offers excellent opportunities for career development for the right candidate.       Responsibilities:         Produce intelligent 3D models and extract information directly from the model to form 2D drawings, schedules, setting out, quantities and other deliverables.     Manage the Highways discipline 3D models, review model quality and technical content including clash detection and compliance with the BEP.     Provide commercial input by pricing up BIM tasks for bids and projects as required.     Work with the Information Manager and project teams to assist in the development and implementation of BIM strategies, BIM Execution Plans, workflows and processes on projects in accordance with Atkins Corporate Standards, Client requirements and industry best practice.     Actively contribute to project design development by contributing to internal coordination, clash detection and design review sessions as well as external presentations to clients.     Manage the Structures Team Common Data Environment (CDE) of the project, and the distribution of coordinated digital documents to the project teams.     Undertake 4D BIM Project timeline modelling.     Provide quality control for compliance to company/project standards of deliverables.     Provide over the shoulder support for staff developing models and 2D drawing extractions.     Provide technical orientation of new hires and student trainees regarding BIM process and workflows.     Maintain a high level of competency of major BIM software tools used.

column2: Maintenance Planning: Develop maintenance plans and schedules for highways and road infrastructure, taking into consideration factors like traffic volume, weather conditions, and budget constraints     Asset Management: Oversee the maintenance of assets such as road surfaces, bridges, signage, and drainage systems to extend their lifespan and ensure safe and efficient operation     Budget Management: Prepare and manage budgets for highway maintenance, allocating resources efficiently to address immediate and long-term maintenance needs     Contract Management: Collaborate with contractors, suppliers, and service providers to ensure the timely and cost-effective delivery of maintenance services     Maintenance Operations: Coordinate and supervise maintenance activities, such as road repairs, pothole filling, snow removal, and line marking, to maintain road safety and usability     Safety Compliance: Ensure that maintenance activities comply with safety standards, regulations, and protocols, and assess potential safety hazards     Environmental Considerations: Implement eco-friendly maintenance practices and mitigate the environmental impact of maintenance activities, such as minimizing pollution and erosion     Asset Inspections: Conduct regular inspections and assessments of road assets to identify maintenance needs and prioritize repairs or upgrades     Emergency Response: Develop and implement emergency response plans for unexpected events like accidents, natural disasters, or severe weather conditions     Data Management: Maintain records and data on maintenance activities, costs, and asset conditions, utilizing technology and data analysis to inform decision-making
column11: Manager Highway, Maintenance Manager

column2: We are currently seeking a skilled and detail-oriented BIM Coordinator with expertise in Civil or MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing) disciplines       As a BIM Coordinator, you will be responsible for managing the coordination process and ensuring the successful implementation of Building Information Modeling (BIM) on our projects     You will collaborate closely with architects, engineers, contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless communication, clash detection, and efficient project deliver            Responsibilities:             Coordinate and manage the BIM process for Civil or MEP projects from conception to completion.         Collaborate with architects, engineers, and other project team members to develop BIM execution plans and project-specific protocols.         Create and maintain 3D BIM models using software such as Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, or similar tools.         Conduct clash detection and resolution to identify and resolve conflicts between various building systems.         Develop and maintain project-specific BIM libraries, templates, and content.         Facilitate model exchange and coordination meetings to ensure effective communication and collaboration among stakeholders.         Train and support project team members in BIM software and workflows.         Review and evaluate BIM models for compliance with project requirements, standards, and industry best practices.         Generate construction documentation, including 2D drawings, schedules, and quantity take-offs from the BIM models.         Stay updated with the latest BIM technologies, industry standards, and emerging trends.         Continuously improve BIM processes, workflows, and protocols to enhance efficiency and productivity.             Qualifications:             Bachelor s degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.         Proven experience as a BIM Coordinator, preferably in the Civil or MEP industry.         Proficiency in BIM software tools such as Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, or similar applications.         Strong understanding of Civil or MEP systems and construction processes.         Familiarity with clash detection and coordination processes.         Knowledge of relevant codes, regulations, and industry standards.         Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.         Strong communication and interpersonal skills.         Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality.             Preferred Skills:             Professional certifications related to BIM, such as Autodesk Certified Professional (ACP) or equivalent.         Experience with clash detection software or tools.         Familiarity with cloud-based collaboration platforms for BIM projects.         Knowledge of energy modeling or sustainability analysis tools.         Experience in coordinating multi-disciplinary BIM models.

Having a US visa would be an added advantage.     Extensive experience of detailing Dry and Wet infrastructure utilities.     Prepare and manage engineering plans and project documents.     Plan, coordinate, and execute work in a safe, timely, cost effective and compliant manner.     Follow BIM and CAD standards. Create, edit, and label alignments, Civil 3D parcels, and corridors.     Create, use, and edit Civil 3D labels. Create feature lines and surfaces.     Manage, data reference, label and interact with a Civil 3D surface.     Perform roadway design, including creating corridors, subassemblies, road FG, contour grading, and surface clean-up/manipulation through Tin/points.     Use Civil 3D to design plan and profiles of utilities, including using and creating pipe networks, editing and changing parts and styles, catch basin sizing/spacing and minimum cover, manhole sizing/spacing and minimum cover, hydrant spacing, and creating waterlines in profile with deflection and exaggeration, per jurisdictional requirements.     Experience of using written and spoken English within a business environment.     Must be an advanced user or expert user in Autodesk Navisworks with capabilities to federate individual discipline BIM Models. Setup, maintain and run clash rules and clash tests across federated BIM Models. Must know how to create search sets, query, find and navigate through BIM Models.     Must be able to use Navisworks to generate clash results, manage clash resolution, redline BIM Models, capture viewpoints and cascade reports to discipline teams. Must be able to perform Navisworks model management.     Computational / Generative design tool experience such as Autodesk Dynamo or Bentley Generative Components.     Technical proficiency in the use of the latest common CDE systems: Bentley ProjectWise and Autodesk BIM360 or ACC. Understanding and experience of handling Civil3D Data Shortcuts within the CDE Environment is a must.         Responsibilities -         Strong experience in modelling and detailing including production of Civil3D Utilities Models and extraction of information directly from the model to form 2D drawings, schedules, setting out, quantities and other deliverables.     Supporting technical delivery of Complex multi-disciplinary engineering projects.     Undertake designs, production and checking of 3D Models, drawings, calculations, reports and specifications.     Compliance with Quality, Safety, Environment, and governance procedures, thus ensuring work produced is technically accurate and delivered in accordance with the appropriate standards.     Supporting the preparation of specifications for construction, technical surveys and design. Supporting the preparation of tender and contract documentation to various forms of contract.     Undertake self-checking and assist with technical checks of work undertaken by the team. Provide quality control for compliance to company/project standards of deliverables.     Manage the Waters, Utilities discipline 3D models, check model quality and technical content including clash detection and compliance with the BEP.     Work with the Information Manager and project teams to assist in the development and implementation of BIM strategies, BIM Execution Plans, workflows and processes on projects in accordance with AtkinsR alis Corporate Standards, Client requirements and industry best practices.     Actively contribute to project design development by contributing to internal coordination, clash detection and design review sessions as well as external presentations to clients.     Provide over the shoulder support for junior staff, mentor and support them through technical training and live project work supervision.         Required attributes -          High performing ability to work and integrate into multi-disciplinary teams and work independently. Ensuring your work is to the highest appropriate standards and in compliance with Atkins quality systems and standards.     Energetic and enthusiastic, with the desire to take on extra responsibilities and constantly upskilling team and oneself.     Excellent written and spoken English communication within a business environment.     Ability to exercise initiative, take ownership of project issues and work independently with excellent time management skills.     You will demonstrate a high level of commitment, flexibility and be eager to accept responsibility and learn new skills, whilst always exercising an active interest in helping to solve technical problems faced by any member of the team.     You will act with integrity and professionalism, gaining the trust of colleagues and setting an example to junior staff.

column2: Bentley Systems is seeking a talented individual to become a valued member of our successful Civil Infrastructure team as a    Civil Engineering Consultant           A Consultant plays an important role in delivering training, consulting and configuration services on Bentley s Civil Engineering Design applications     A Consultant is responsible for analyzing our software users business and technical requirements and developing solutions that meet those needs               Your Day-to-Day:         Deliver consulting, configuration, and training services on Bentley s Civil Engineering Design applications to existing and new software users. Strong command of the English language with clear speaking skills for recording videos and teaching live training classes.     Ability to learn and effectively demonstrate, configure, present training and consult on the Bentley Civil Engineering Design application. column2: ?     We are seeking a Transmission Line Engineer to join our team in GTC India. The Transmission Lines Engineer is responsible for preparing or review/approve conceptual design and detailed engineering packages for HV MV poles and foundations. As well as preparing project scope of works, design specifications, specifications for construction procedures and methods, and bill of material. So, if you are interested in working for an internationally renowned consultancy and working on some of the challenging projects across USA come and join us at AtkinsR alis.       About the Role Responsibilities:       Using your experience and knowledge, you will be leading the delivery of a variety of projects drawing upon the wider team for the technical engineering requirements and building a strong relationship with our clients. You will be client-facing, responsible for the delivery of our work and making sure it meets our client s expectations.     This role will be based at our AtkinsR alis office in Bangalore and Gurgaon in India       You will be taking up the following responsibilities: In depth knowledge and expertise in the following.         Actively participate in securing TD projects by sourcing active RFPs and developing proposals.     Detailed design and engineering of 12 kV to 500 kV overhead transmission line projects from conceptual design through to construction.     Detailed design of underground transmission line projects from 12 kV to 230 kV.     Conduct feasibility and planning studies.     Prepare planning and detailed project cost estimates including engineering, materials, and construction. Prepare study reports and other technical documentation.     Prepare construction and material specifications and scope documents for construction tenders and contracts.     Act as a mentor to junior engineers. Interface with clients and contractors.     Coordinate with various disciplines, review work of other engineers and technologists.     Interface with permitting agencies and regulatory bodies.     Design of pylons in steel, wood, or polymers.     Design of the foundations - steel, concrete, piles, screw piles, anchoring in the rock etc.     Structure detailing, structure connection calculations and material take-off.     Perform studies, write reports, and prepare specifications.     Prepare construction details and supervise the work of technicians and designers.     Stay up to date on the latest technologies to integrate them into the process of conception.     Coordinate the work internally as well as with the client. Experience in OHTL (Overhead Transmission Line) with Tower Design Experience is must.     Knowledge of PLS CADD, PLS TOWER and PLS POLE software.     Available for occasional business trips.     Professional spirit and good organizational skills.     Analyse study results and recommend solutions as per requirements and able to discuss/clarify Clients with help of results.     Respond to request for proposals (RFP) by preparing proposals estimation of man-hours.     Mentoring junior staffs and able to provide training on subject of expertise and present study results to Clients. column2: Burns & McDonnell?? Transmission and Distribution (T&D) Global Practice is an industry leader, ranked No. 1 by Engineering News-record magazine. Burns & McDonnell India?? column2: Burns McDonnell India (BMI) Transmission Engineering Department is looking for engineers to support our Transmission Line Engineering and Design Team in the Mumbai/Bangalore Office     TD offers depth and breadth of experience in power delivery facilities like overhead transmission-distribution, underground transmission-distribution, substation design, renewable power integration, Smart Grid and more, which offer a wide range of design and project execution experiences     This position is responsible for Transmission line modelling and structural design of Transmission line Projects     Candidate will perform work which involves both conventional civil engineering practices and complex situations, requiring innovation relative to work practices and procedures         Following are some specific duties responsibilities:           Performing Transmission line planning, modelling, analysis and design in PLS-CADD, PLS-Pole and PLS-Tower, foundation designs etc         Structural analysis and design of lattice tower and line poles (Steel, LD, Wood) and loading framing trees, plan profile drawings, authority permit drawings, wire sag and tension analysis, developing design criteria for transmission line design and create bill of materials, engineering estimate, and quality control reviews.         Developing specifications, procurement support, reviewing vendor drawings         Create accurate estimates for the project to match standard industrial practice.         Monitor and provide regular updates to assistant department manager about progress and activities to ensure projects remain on schedule and within budget.         Provide technical and engineering expertise along the guide to identify, analyze and resolve problems.         Plan, organize, estimate, schedule and effectively monitor all work activities.         Support project team to develop significant engineering solutions         Participate in regular meeting and corresponding with Clients.         Ability and willingness to travel as needed within the continental US to support assignments on projects and overall office needs.         Willing to advance in career by taking increased engineering design responsibilities by closely working with discipline lead engineer         Ensure that all duties are carried out according to the companys Quality Systems Procedures.         A committed team player able to work on own initiative         Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, client service orientation         Identify development needs of team and mentor, coach and develop team members (engineers, designers, drafters)         Provide specialist knowledge input and keep up to date with the latest developments in particular fields.         Self-starter with excellent communication skills, both verbal and written to communicate effectively with internal team members and external clients.           Qualifications           Bachelors/Masters degree in Electrical/Civil engineering, with 2-12 years of experience.         Prefer if Power Transmission experience.         Able to handle multiple projects/clients simultaneously and to prioritize work.         Capable of devising new, more efficient approaches to solving problems and processes.         Proficient in the English language.         Computer software knowledge in MS-office, Auto-Cad, MicroStation, Analysis software/ tools, Google Earth, Arc-GIS         Flexibility to work in different roles for different clients both locally and worldwide.         Familiarity with design codes and standards such as NESC, IEC, CSA, IEEE, ANSI, IBC, ASCE 7, AISC, AND ACI 318 is preferred

column1: Roads and Highways Expert (D P I I T)
column2: Road & Highway   Expert       Minimum  Graduate in Economics/ STEM/ Management  Desirable  Post-Graduate or PhD in Economics/ STEM/ Management Experience 1. 15 years of professional experience in infrastructure planning, development, operations, and management of throughpul utilizing key Road & Highways infrastructure etc.  2. Experience in planning, policy and framework is essential for the above role.  3. Experience in the execution of the Road & Highways infrastructure Project   JOB DESCRIPTION The Road and Highway Expert for the PM GatiShakti program will be responsible for  providing specialized knowledge and expertise in the planning, design, development, and optimization of road and highway infrastructure. This role involves strategic analysis, project management, and stakeholder coordination to enhance the efficiency, connectivity, and sustainability of road networks in line with the objectives of PM GatiShakti. Key Responsibilities: 1. Strategic Planning and Analysis: Develop comprehensive road and highway development plans that align with the objectives of PM GatiShakti. Conduct detailed analyses of current road networks and forecast future needs based on tralfic patterns, economic growth, and technological advancements. Perform feasibility studies and risk assessments for proposed road and highway projects 2. Technical Expertise and innovation: Provide technical guidance on road and highway design, construction, and maintenance practices. ldentify and promote the adoption of innovative lechnologies and practices to improve road infrastructure and operations. Ensure the integration of multi-modal transport solutions, enhancing overall connectivity and efficiency 3. Poticy and Regulatory Compliance: Ensure road and highway projects comply with national and regional policies, regulations, and safety standards. Stay updated on changes in transportation laws, regulations, and best practices. Advise on policy development to support road infrastructure improvement and innovation 4.   Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with government agencies, private sector stakeholders, and local communities to gather input and address concerns related to road and highway projects. Facilitate meetings, consultations, and workshops to promote stakeholder participation and transparency. Coordination with stakeholders and all concerned authorities for primary and secondary data for integrated planning of Road & Highways projects especially in reference of multi modal connectivity. 5.   Data Management and Reporting: Maintain accurate records of road and highway data, plans, and projects. Utilize Geographic lnformation Systems (GlS) and other planning tools for spatial analysis and project visualization. Prepare detailed analytical reports and dashboards for monitoring and evaluation purposes. Staying informed about emerging trends, technologies, and best practices in road and highway planning, design, and construction, and applying this knowledge to improve project outcomes and drive innovation    In case you are interested, kindly revert me with the following details: Current Company: Current Designation: Highest Education: Current CTC: Expected CTC: Current Location: Comfortable with Delhi (Please specify Yes / NO) : Total Year of Exp : Relevant Years of Exp: Notice Period: Please Share your updated CV at  reshma.rana@nisg.org

Proficient in CAD/BIM design and coordination tools     Ability to work closely with the design teams as necessary to coordinate design, 3D BIM Modelling and drawing production     Ability to customise and automate programs and menus to increase 3D model and drawing productivity     Knowledge of International standards and best practices     Experience of using and optimising CAD & BIM resource libraries (Revit Families, Templates, cells / blocks, objects, seed files, etc)     Strong general computer skills and a good knowledge of working in relevant applications of MS Office     Good written and verbal communication skills in English language (CEFR minimum level B1)     Effective time management and strong organisational skills     A passion for quality and continuous improvement with a focus on delivery             We appreciate if you have         Experience of working on projects associated with the Swedish Transport Administration     Experience of working with projects in the Nordics     Ability to utilise Autodesk Revit, BIM 360/ACC and Bentley AECOsim/OpenBuilding Designer, ProjectWise, & iTwin Applications in adherence to defined CAD & BIM standards to lead and develop engineering Models and drawings.

column2: We are looking for responsibility, design freedom, and the hunger to create amazing spaces and revolutionize the definition of workspace. The role includes designing both standard, custom and managed WeWork locations. We are searching for an MEP Revit Modeller who will be responsible for drafting/modelling MEP services on REVIT with proficient knowledge on MEP design calculations, DBRs & SLDs. Should be able to coordinate with WeWork Architects, incorporate site-related TDD inputs, Clash coordination & release of GFC dwgs to site.        Roles and Responsibilities:          Technical expertise in Software Tools-Revit MEP, BIM 360, AutoCAD MEP and Navisworks Manage.      To ensure all stages of dwgs from Critical set to Tender set to GFC set to As-built are properly categorized and saved on Autodesk/Procure( in collaboration with the PMC, Cost controller & T&C representatives at the site.)      Proficient in Revit MEP modelling (HVAC, Electrical, Plumbing & Fire Fighting) and Coordination of services      Revit MEP Services drawing and Coordinated Drawing Creation      Preparation of Revit MEP BOQ      Navisworks Clash Detection, Resolving the clashes and Coordination     Knowledge of different LODs      Well-versed with collaboration tools like BIM 360 and Bluebeam      Navisworks Coordination and BIM documentation (Modelling, Clash Detection & Drawings Creation)      Design Knowledge of HVAC, Electrical, Plumbing and Fire Fighting      Proficient on heat load calculation, piping designs, Electrical load calculations, Developing the concept level design with DBRs & SLDs, Water demand calculations, all MEP equipment selections     Knowledge of Revit Dynamo programming/Running the scripts added advantage     Manage project work- modeling and detailing     Ensuring the relevant QA procedures are followed     Design, document, and execute multiple simultaneous high quality projects, by collaborating with all internal and external teams      Maintain High documentation standards, both internally and externally by QCing external consultants' deliverables and submissions      Mentor the team and ensure that the desired levels of quality and accuracy are maintained uniformly across team deliverables      Open to site visits across India          Education and Desired Qualifications:         BE/Diploma in Mech/Electrical from a reputed institute      Certificate course on Revit & Navisworksfrom a reputed institute.     4 -6 years of professional MEP modelling experience in high-quality commercial or hospitality projects. Mixed-use residential, cultural, and institutional experiences also will be considered.      A commitment to delivering outstanding high-quality design      Ambitious, out-of-the-box thinker      Interest in rule-based design refined over multiple iterations      Reliable, focused, and detail-oriented      Some demonstrable experience in design documentation in a BIM(Revit) Workflow     Ability to invoke applicable building, accessibility codes, and zoning in the design scheme      Excellent decision-making skills      Self-directed with a high level of initiative and a can do attitude, but open to feedback      Highly resourceful problem solver and quick learner      Strong time management skills      Excellent organizational and people skills      Proficient in the following programs: Revit,AutoCAD, all things Google, Exposure to BIM 360.
column11: Hospitality, HVAC, AutoCAD, TDD, Bim, MEP, Workflow, REVIT, Autodesk, mep design

He/she should have experience of at least 2 project in the of highway of Annuity or PPP Projects  Must be having exposure of any external funded project (ADB/WB/NDB/MDBs). Preferential Qualification:  a) Post Graduate Degree in Transportation Engineering is preferred.   Perks and Benefits   Best in Industry Pls share CV at guru.bandhu@ictonline.com/ Whatsapp at 9899202646 (No call pls) ANY REFERENCE IS HIGHLY APPRECIABLE.
